entries.message: We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Dallas location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Chicago location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-06-18 05:05:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-06-18 09:05:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Chicago instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Seattle location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-06-17 07:05:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-06-17 11:05:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Seattle instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Systems Upgrade

We are performing system upgrades in the Chicago location during the following scheduled maintenance window.

Start Time: 2025-06-19 13:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-06-19 21:00:00 UTC

These changes are limited to Storage products in the Chicago location, including:

- Vultr Filesystem
- Vultr Block Storage
- Vultr Object Storage
- Storage Gateways

Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, the services noted above may be unreachable in Chicago for some of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform host upgrades.
